name: subcfn
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wfn(c0, cxp(c1, c1)))
-| wi(w0, wbr(c0, cssc, cfv(chomf, c2)))
-| wi(w0, wceq(c1, cdm(cdm(c0))))
body.pretty:
⊢ (w0 → c0[Fn](c1 × c1))
⊣ (w0 → c0[C_cat](Homf ` c2))
⊣ (w0 → c1 = dom(dom(c0)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wfn(c0, cxp(c1, c1)))
-| wi(w0, wbr(c0, cssc, cfv(chomf, c2)))
-| wi(w0, wceq(c1, cdm(cdm(c0))))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (w0 → c0[Fn](c1 × c1))
⊣ (w0 → c0[C_cat](Homf ` c2))
⊣ (w0 → c1 = dom(dom(c0)))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wbr(c0, cssc, cfv(chomf, c2)))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cfv(csubc, c2)))
-| wceq(cfv(chomf, c2), cfv(chomf, c2))
body.pretty:
⊢ (w0 → c0[C_cat](Homf ` c2))
⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈(Subcat ` c2))
⊣ (Homf ` c2)=(Homf ` c2)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wfn(c0, cxp(c1, c1)))
-| wi(w0, wceq(c1, cdm(cdm(c0))))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cfv(csubc, c2)))
-| wceq(cfv(chomf, c2), cfv(chomf, c2))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (w0 → c0[Fn](c1 × c1))
⊣ (w0 → c1 = dom(dom(c0)))
⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈(Subcat ` c2))
⊣ (Homf ` c2)=(Homf ` c2)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wfn(c0, cxp(c1, c1)))
-| wi(w0, wceq(c1, cdm(cdm(c0))))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cfv(csubc, c2)))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (w0 → c0[Fn](c1 × c1))
⊣ (w0 → c1 = dom(dom(c0)))
⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈(Subcat ` c2))

comment: An element in the set of subcategories is a binary function. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 4-Jan-2017.)
